content:
I remember, according to the Academia's records,
the timing of when driftboxes appear on the beach
depends on the speed of the waves.
info: 幻雪关于漂流盒闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Sani told me she found
a message in a bottle by the shore, how intriguing...
Have you ever found one yourself?
info: 幻雪关于漂流盒闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
But how these drifting boxes ended up in each world bubble
remains an unsolved question.
...How mysterious~.
info: 幻雪关于漂流盒闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
